Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Class LinearRgb65ColorSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.color.ColorSpace
      • imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgb65ColorSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectD65Conversion, RgbPrimaries, Serializable
    public class LinearRgb65ColorSpace
extends ColorSpace
implements DirectD65Conversion, RgbPrimaries
    Defines a linear RGB space with the same white point and primaries as sRGB. Everything is D65, components of all float[] colors are supposed to be in [0,1]. This is a singleton class with no public constructors, use getInstance() to obtain the single instance.
    Version:
    2022/11/14
    See Also:
    sRgbColorSpace, Serialized Form

      • toCIEXYZ65

        public float[] toCIEXYZ65​(float[] rgb)
        Description copied from interface: DirectD65Conversion
        Analogous to DirectD65Conversion.toCIEXYZ(float[]) but returns D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this method to avoid the additional D50 to D65 conversion.
        Specified by:
        toCIEXYZ65 in interface DirectD65Conversion
        Parameters:
        rgb - color value in this color space
        Returns:
        D65-based XYZ color values

        Specified by:
        fromCIEXYZ65 in interface DirectD65Conversion
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        color values in this color space
